StandardShippingRate.name: StandardShippingRate
StandardShippingRate.description: Standard shipping rate for a store.

ConditionFactor.description: Conditions that affect the shipping rate.

ConditionRangeMax.description: Maximum value of the shipping rate condition.

ConditionRangeMin.description: Minimum value of the shipping rate condition. This value can't be negative.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Currency ISO code of the cart.

Name.description: Name of the standard shipping rate.

ShippingCarrierMethodId.description: ID of the shipping service carrier method. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

TransitTimeMax.description: Maximum value of the shipping transit time. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

TransitTimeMin.description: Minimum value of the shipping transit time. This value can't be negative. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

TransitTimeUnit.description: Unit of value for shipping transit time. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

WeightUnit.description: Unit of measurement for the weight of the cart items. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.
